roleset.name: state again
roleset.note: REITERATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reiterate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry 37.7, other framed members include announce, claim, declare, mention, observe, repeat, restate, and state. Probably "say", also. Framenet class Statement. Comparison with restate. (from reiterate.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: most common usage
example.text: The company reiterated yesterday that it's willing to reconfigure the package, but not add to the substance of it.
example.arg: that it's willing to reconfigure the package, but not add to the substance of it

example.name: ARG2
example.text: I reiterated to him that he was able to complete boring work just like he had done before.
example.arg: that he was able to complete boring work just like he had done before.
